# `polars not` for [dataframe](/commands/categories/dataframe.md)

<div class='command-title'>Inverts boolean mask.</div>

## Signature

```> polars not {flags} ```


## Input/output types:

| input | output |
| ----- | ------ |
| any   | any    |

## Examples

Inverts boolean mask
```nu
> [true false true] | polars into-df | polars not
╭───┬───────╮
│ # │   0   │
├───┼───────┤
│ 0 │ false │
│ 1 │ true  │
│ 2 │ false │
╰───┴───────╯

```
